title: Why Tennessee would benefit from recycling more glass | Opinion - Tennessean
summary: The article discusses the benefits of glass recycling for the environment and manufacturing process, emphasizing the importance of recycling glass bottles and jars to reduce waste and lower carbon dioxide emissions.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is green innovation as it promotes recycling and sustainable practices in manufacturing and resource conservation.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article focuses on environmental impact and recycling rather than a new or improved product or business process.
green_product: TRUE. The article highlights the benefits of using recycled glass in manufacturing processes, which aligns with the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE. The article discusses the method of glass recycling as a way to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 327213 - Glass Container Manufacturing, 56292 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services, 562111 - Solid Waste Collection
greenwashing: FALSE. The article provides factual information about the environmental benefits of glass recycling rather than presenting false or misleading claims.
